item.title: Signing Android Apps
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: As an Android Engineer, I have to sign Android apps whenever making a public release. The steps are quite simple and well documented on the official website.
item.dc:creator: Nishant

item.title: Another Compose(it): Desktop @Droidcon Italy
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Droidcon Italy, Online Abstract Developing for multi-platform is picking up speed as the Kotlin Multi-Platform gets better with every release. That mostly means that shared logic is being written in Kotlin which can then be targeted to many target platforms.
item.dc:creator: Nishant Srivastava

item.title: Demystifying Low Latency Audio on Android @Droidcon APAC
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Droidcon APAC ‘20, Online Abstract Enabling an enhanced audio experience for your users is the topmost priority for developers who build audio processing apps. Android, however, holds dark secrets about low latency audio, thus making it harder for developers to build responsive audio apps and user experiences.

item.title: Is your Android Library, Lifecycle-Aware?
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Lifecycle events in Android. It has been a pain point for Android developers all over the world. It is no brainer that, most of the times the main cause of a memory leak in the codebase is because an invalid state is accessed which is out of sync with the lifecycle of the activity/fragment of the app.
item.dc:creator: Nishant

item.title: I could not find a simple Gesture Detection android library, so I built one
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: While working on various projects, there have been times when I have had to implement various gesture-based events. Every time I have had to do that I had to write the whole code for getting the SensorManager and getting access to the SensorEvent, plus the extra logic to detect the gesture.
item.dc:creator: Nishant
